name: AddTeamLink
description:
Add a new link to a Datadog team.

Use this tool to add a new link to a specific team's page in Datadog. Suitable for enhancing team resources or documentation by linking additional references.

parameters.name: target_team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team to which the link will be added.

parameters.name: link_label
parameters.description: The label for the link to be added to the team. This should be a descriptive text for the link.

parameters.name: link_url
parameters.description: The URL to be added as a link for the team. This should be a valid web address.

parameters.name: team_link_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of team link. Must be 'team_links'.

parameters.name: link_position
parameters.description: The position of the link in the team's list, used for sorting links.

value_schema.description: The link's position, used to sort links for the team

parameters.name: team_id_for_link
parameters.description: ID of the team the link is associated with. This should be a unique identifier for the specific team to which you want to add the link.

value_schema.description: ID of the team the link is associated with

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.description: The link's position, used to sort links for the team

value_schema.description: The link's position, used to sort links for the team
